level.heading: Annual report of Account.
level.text: The Mayor of the District of Columbia shall, by November 1 of each year, submit a report to the Council of the District of Columbia delineating the revenues deposited in the Metrorail/Metrobus Account and the amounts, purposes, and expenditures from the Metrorail/Metrobus Account.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-103
level.text: Law 4-103, the "Stable and Reliable Source of Revenues for WMATA Act of 1982," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-61, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue and the Committee on Transportation and Environmental Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 9, 1982 and February 23, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 10, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-164 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
